source.ef05322c:
img_size=105

data=[]
for catt in categories:
    folder=os.path.join(diir,catt) #gets folder path to cats and dogs
    label=categories.index(catt)#creating label for the images
    for img in os.listdir(folder):
        img_path=os.path.join(folder,img)#gets folder path to cats and dogs with images 
        img_arr=cv2.imread(img_path)
        img_arr=cv2.resize(img_arr, (img_size,img_size)).flatten()# resizing the image to specific pixels
        data.append([img_arr,label])

X=[]

for features,labels in data:
    X.append(features)
    y.append(labels)
#converting list to array
X=np.array(X)
y=np.array(y)
